vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Finance and Management to enter into a non-profit service contract with RIP Medical Debt; to authorize the transfer of $2,000,000.00 within the Recovery Fund; and to authorize the expenditure of up to $2,000,000.00 from the Recovery Fund. ($2,000,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Nicholas Bankston, seconded by Shayla Favor, that this Ordinance be Postponed to Date 2/6/23. The motion carried by the following vote:
